commands.title: /help
commands.description: DMs the user with available commands

commands.title: /view
commands.description: DMs the user with the list (or a link) of challenges

commands.title: /submit <challenge> <media consent>
commands.description: Submit the challenge number to the judges via discord. The next attachment message you send will be submitted to the judges.

commands.title: /submitlink <challenge> <link> <media consent>
commands.description: Submit the challenge number to the judges with the given link.

commands.title: /status <challenge>
commands.description: DMs the user the status of a certain challenge number
